title: Kendall Jenner shoots Calvin Klein campaign in green 1940s dress
text:
She jets around the world for her work as a supermodel.

But Kendall Jenner had a gig in her hometown of Los Angeles this Monday when she was seen shooting a Calvin Klein ad. The 23-year-old brought back 1940s chic in a sleek moss green wrap dress that featured lapels and folded-up sleeves.

This shoots comes just before the star is set to celebrate her 24th birthday on November 3.

Hard at work: Kendall Jenner had a gig in her hometown of Los Angeles this Monday when she was seen shooting a Calvin Klein ad

Cinching a belt around her enviably trim waistline, she accessorized with a glittering bracelet and popped on a pair of tortoiseshell shades.

Kendall could be spotted sweeping her hair out of her eyes as she sheltered from the sun while under an umbrella at one point in her shoot day.

The daughter of Kris and Caitlyn Jenner recently featured in a star-studded ad campaign for a Giambattista Valli collaboration with H&M.

She was part of a sensational lineup that included Shameless actor Cameron Monaghan, singer-songwriter H.E.R. and Italian fashion blogger Chiara Ferragni.

Gal on the go: The 23-year-old brought back 1940s chic in a sleek moss green wrap dress that featured lapels and folded-up sleeves

A place in the sun: Kendall could be spotted sweeping her hair out of her eyes as she sheltered under the umbrella from the rays at one point in her shoot day

'I love the dramatic yet accessible silhouettes; they make me feel powerful and effortless, which is what being fabulous is all about, in my opinion,' Kendall gushed of the collection to Harper's Bazaar.

The globetrotting clotheshorse, who went to Giambattista's native Rome for the ad shoot, said: 'It’s also the personal touches throughout the collection that make me really connect to the pieces. It’s like wearing a little piece of Giamba himself.'

Kendall's latest gig comes days after she and her little sister Kylie Jenner, 22, co-starred in an Instagram plug for their joint clothing line.

Kylie showed off her curves in a fitted sweater dress while Kendall unleashed her animal instinct in a fuzzy leopard print top.

Roman holiday: The daughter of Kris and Caitlyn Jenner recently featured in a star-studded ad campaign for a Giambattista Valli collaboration with H&M

Last week Kylie went viral for 'Rise And Shine,' a brief song she sang to her one-year-old daughter Stormi at the offices of her billion-dollar cosmetics empire.

In the heartwarming video, Stormi, whose father is the rapper Travis Scott, 28, repeatedly demanded that 'Daddy sing!'

'Rise And Shine' quickly became an Internet sensation to the point that Kylie has begun selling clothes with the phrase printed on them.

Kylie and Travis broke up recently but have remained amicable co-parents and took their daughter to a pumpkin patch together last Wednesday.
description: She jets around the world for her work as a supermodel. But Kendall Jenner had a gig in her hometown of Los Angeles this Monday when she was seen shooting a Calvin Klein ad.
